meanings.definition: A person who produces or sells pornographic material.
meanings.sent1: The pornographer made a lot of money selling adult magazines.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the pornographer for distributing illegal content.
meanings.sent3: The aspiring pornographer accidentally printed a recipe book instead of adult magazines.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley was whispered to be the haunt of a mysterious pornographer.
meanings.sent5: The town's only pornographer was known for his discreet deliveries.

meanings.definition: A person who creates or distributes sexually explicit content for profit.
meanings.sent1: The local pornographer had a large following online.
meanings.sent2: The film industry often portrays pornographers as shady characters.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy pornographer spilled coffee on his latest DVD collection.
meanings.sent4: In the world of underground art, she was considered a visionary pornographer.
meanings.sent5: The wealthy businessman secretly moonlighted as a pornographer.
